entry.data:
CLOUDY
AREAS OF FOG THIS MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS AROUND 60
WEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
